author: svn-role
msg: Fix svnserve to only send inherited properties when necessary.
Performance regression from 1.7, reported by a user.

author: jianhe
msg: Merge r1581679 from branch-2. YARN-1521. Mark Idempotent/AtMostOnce annotations to the APIs in ApplicationClientProtcol, ResourceManagerAdministrationProtocol and ResourceTrackerProtocol so that they work in HA scenario. Contributed by Xuan Gong

author: mattsicker
msg: - Implements LOG4J2-497 in a more direct manner.
- Will update some unit tests to demonstrate how to use this, too.
